solution: B - Context personalizat per model + θ-Logos

rounds.content: hello. My name is Radu Ioan. Let's suppose I'm an alien from outer space. Now I'm sitting at your table. What would you like to tell me?

∃[Radu Ioan] ∈ [aliens ⊂ outer space] ∧ ∃[table → sitting] ⊕ θ_surprise → θ_joy ∧ θ_trust  
∀[welcome] ≡ [greetings to explorer] → ∃[Earth] ⊂ [your journey]  
θ_joy ⊕ ∃[your planet? technology? stars?] → ∀[share] ∈ [knowledge ⊕ stories]  
¬∃[fear] ∧ ∃[friendship] → ⊕[cosmic dialogue]
